data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morin, David P., Alexander, Patrick J., Beck, James B., Windham, Michael D., Bailey, C. Donovan (2018): Deciphering the sexual diploid members of the Boecherasuffrutescens complex (Brassicaceae, Boechereae). PhytoKeys 98: 15-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.98.24296, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.98.24296
